name: Hypothermia (Steinchen)
description:
Topic: Escape

Team name: Fox and Bear

Team members: Rebekka Heidenberger and Clemens Petri

Title: Hypothermia

Goal: Gather the five logs scattered throughout the level and return to the campfire in time.

Controls:

Gamepad:  

                            A = Jump

                            Analog Stick Left = Walk left

                           Analog Stick Right = Walk right

Keyboard:

                           Space Bar = Jump

                           A = Walk left

                           D = Walk right
